current_contact.agency: San Bernardino County Sheriff Department - Coroner Division

case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Partial skeletal parts only
case_address_found_1: 5 miles east of Ludlow, south of SR 66
case_circumstances: Remains of a young male and a young female were found in a shallow grave in remote desert area off of "Route 66."  Estimated to be 17 to 22 years of age.Identity can only be established by comparison of dental X-rays, head X-rays and DNA (nucDNA and mtDNA).  Possible identiifcation by comparison of "smiling photos" (showing teeth).  Accoridng to this department's Forensic Odontologist: "Jane Doe had multiple gaps in her smile, both top and bottom, with congenitally missing lateral incisors and a retained primary right canine.  Her smile was incredibly distinctive and should be recognizable on a photo."
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
